input_text:
Job Title: Python Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Python Developer - Remote, USA
About Autod AI:Autod AI is at the forefront of the artificial intelligence revolution, developing state-of-the-art AI solutions that are transforming industries by automating complex processes and enhancing decision-making through data analysis. We are currently on the lookout for a talented Python Developer to join our team. This role is fully remote, accessible to candidates across the United States, with flexible working hours tailored between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. At Autod AI, we offer the flexibility of both contract and regular employment, focusing on finding the right fit for our innovative and dynamic team.
Your Role:As a Python Developer at Autod AI, you will be central to the development and implementation of our AI-powered solutions. Your work will involve writing clean, efficient, and scalable code primarily in Python, collaborating with our team of AI researchers and data scientists to turn cutting-edge AI research into practical, impactful applications. You'll contribute to a wide range of projects, from developing algorithms that process large datasets to implementing machine learning models that drive real-world solutions.
Key Responsibilities:Develop and maintain robust Python code for various AI and machine learning projects.Collaborate with AI researchers to implement and optimize algorithms.Design and develop data processing and analysis tools.Ensure code quality, stability, and scalability.Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.Write documentation for software development and ensure comprehensive test coverage.Stay updated with new Python libraries, AI research, and best practices in software development.
Technical Requirements:Proficiency in Python and experience with Python frameworks (such as Django, Flask).Strong understanding of the software development lifecycle.Experience with AI and machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) is highly preferred.Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side data processing.Knowledge of relational and non-relational databases.Proficiency in version control tools, such as Git.Experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.Ability to work with front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML/CSS) is advantageous.
Experience:2+ years of professional experience in Python development.Demonstrated experience in developing and implementing machine learning models or working on AI-driven projects is highly desirable.
Who You Are:Passionate about AI and software development, with a keen interest in leveraging technology to solve real-world problems.A self-motivated individual who thrives in a remote working environment, with strong organizational skills and the ability to manage your workload effectively.Excellent communication skills, capable of collaborating effectively with a distributed team.Eager to learn and stay abreast of the latest technologies and methodologies in AI and software development.
Join Us:At Autod AI, you’ll be part of an innovative company that’s pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with artificial intelligence. Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely across the US, with standard working hours that support work-life balance. Here, we value the expertise and passion you bring to our team over formal education.
Please note: This position does not require a university degree. We prioritize practical experience, a proven track record in Python development, and a strong interest in AI and machine learning over formal education.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Python Developer
output_json.summary: Join Autod AI, a leader in AI solutions, as a Python Developer in a fully remote role across the United States.
job_responsibilities: Develop and maintain robust Python code for AI and machine learning projects.
Collaborate with AI researchers to implement and optimize algorithms.
Design and develop data processing and analysis tools.
Ensure code quality, stability, and scalability.
Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.
Write documentation for software development and ensure comprehensive test coverage.
Stay updated with new Python libraries, AI research, and best practices in software development.
benefits: Remote working across the United States
output_json.company_information: Autod AI is a leading AI solutions provider, transforming industries through automation and data analysis.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We value expertise and passion over formal education.
